Class StaffServiceFacade

java.lang.Object
StaffServiceFacade
public class StaffServiceFacade extends Object
The `StaffServiceFacade` class provides a centralized interface for managing hospital staff, including adding, updating, removing, and retrieving staff details. It follows the Singleton design pattern to ensure a single instance is used throughout the application.

    • updateStaff

      public boolean updateStaff(String staffID, String fieldToUpdate, String newValue)
      Updates a specific field of a staff member's record.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the staff member to update.
      fieldToUpdate - The field to update (e.g., "Name", "Email").
      newValue - The new value for the field.
      Returns:
      `true` if the update was successful, otherwise `false`.

    • getStaffById

      public User getStaffById(String staffID)
      Retrieves a staff member's details by their ID.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the staff member.
      Returns:
      The `User` object representing the staff member, or `null` if not found.

    • getAllStaff

      public List<User> getAllStaff()
      Retrieves a list of all staff members.
      Returns:
      A list of all `User` objects representing staff members.

    • filterStaff

      public List<User> filterStaff(String filterType, String filterValue)
      Filters staff members based on specific criteria.
      Parameters:
      filterType - The type of filter to apply (e.g., "Role", "Gender").
      filterValue - The value to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of staff members matching the filter criteria.

    • displayFilteredStaff

      Parameters:
      filterType - The type of filter to apply (e.g., "Role", "Gender").
      filterValue - The value to filter by.
